scripts.test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter spec tests/*.js
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/react-bash.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/react-bash.min.js
scripts.build:demo: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack demo/index.js demo/dist/react-bash.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.gh-pages: npm run build:demo && git add -f demo/dist && git commit -m "deploy to gh-pages" && git subtree split --prefix demo -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
